    • Constructor Detail

      • TransmissionControlProtocolInterface

        public TransmissionControlProtocolInterface(AttackPattern attackPattern,
                                            java.lang.String masterAddress,
                                            int masterPort)
        Transmission control protocol interface constuctor. It receives a attack pattern object, the master server address and the master server port and send these parameters to super class, Protocol abstract class in this case.
        Parameters:
        attackPattern - The attack pattern object.
        masterAddress - The master server IP address.
        masterPort - THe master server port value.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        How the super class Protocol implements the Runnable interface, this class implements the run method for thread task. In this method, all socket connection will be initialized and the message will be transmited.

      • createConnection

        public void createConnection()
        This method is responsible for creating a new socket connection and setting other settings as socket time out and socket inet address.
        Specified by:
        createConnection in class Protocol

      • connect

        public void connect()
        This method does the connection with target by socket.
        Specified by:
        connect in class Protocol

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        This method is responsible for closing the socket connection with target.
        Specified by:
        closeConnection in class Protocol

      • setSocket

        public void setSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
        The socket state attribute modifier method.
        Parameters:
        socket - A socket object.

      • getSocket

        public java.net.Socket getSocket()
        The socket state attribute accessor method.
        Returns:
        Socket A socket object.
